description: A night of mayhem leaves shops smashed up and looted in the industrial south German city.
title: Germany riot: Gangs smash shops and attack police in Stuttgart
title_page: Germany riot: Gangs smash shops and attack police in Stuttgart - BBC News
maintext: What he described as people from the "party and event scene" in Stuttgart had been getting drunk in public and adopted an aggressive and insulting tone towards police on social media.
